powers.title: Run
powers.description: For the next hour you can run as fast as a horse.

powers.title: Walk on walls/ceiling
powers.description: For the next 20 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was regular floor.

powers.title: Mold Earth
powers.description:
You can target an area (5x5 meter cube) of loose earth, you can instantaneously excavate it, move it along the ground, and deposit it up to 5 meters away.
You can cause shapes, colors, or both to appear on the dirt or stone, spelling out words, creating images, or shaping patterns.

powers.title: Push/Pull metal
powers.description: Push metal directly away from you, or pull it towards you. If the object is lighter than you, the object moves, if it’s heavier - you move. If an object is thrown at a speed, deals 4 damage.

powers.title: Levitate
powers.description: Slowly lifts the target (object, creature, including yourself) vertically above the ground, up to 10 meters. The target can weight up to 300 kg.

powers.title: Greater Telekinesis
powers.description:
Levitate human-sized objects and creatures.
Throwing an object/creature deals 5 damage to the target and to the object.
(requires “Minor Telekinesis”)

powers.title: Fly
powers.description: Grant the power of flight to the target creature(including yourself). The target can fly at a speed of a bird for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Major Illusion
powers.description: Create an object no larger than an elephant, complete with sounds, smells, movement.
